pr_title: Fix for mapping guest OS type read from OVF to existing guest OS in C…

timeline.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: I've taken out minimum method and used min(min(x,y),z)
replies.author: harikrishna-patnala

timeline.bodyText:
some small worry here. I'm not sure it applies to guestos names, but linguistically this can yield false positives easily;

"van os"
"vanos"
"fan nos"
"vamos"
"fam. os"
with the bare eye the last one is the proper replacement of the first. Would this algorithm yield this?
timeline.author: DaanHoogland

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param str1
          
          
            
                 *      String that needs editing
          
          
            
                 * @param str2
          
          
            
                 *      Target string that needs after editing
          
          
            
                 * @param str1     String that needs editing
          
          
            
                 * @param str2     Target string that is required/expected after editing
timeline.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: Updated this section with suggested changes
replies.author: harikrishna-patnala

timeline.bodyText:
can we have some unit tests for this, please?
I think it assumes a definition of what an edit is, that we need to make explicit as well.
timeline.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: Added unit tests in new commit.

timeline.message: Updated os description logic to keep equals ignore match with guest os display name

timeline.bodyText: Minor nit - I think variable == null maybe more readable, but as I said that's not picking

replies.bodyText: depends on how accustomed you are in right to left reading ;)

replies.bodyText: making habit of this to avoid setting null to the variable by mistake, in that case IDE also don't know if it is logically wrong "if (guestOsId = null)" :p

timeline.message: Fix for mapping guest OS type read from OVF to existing guest OS in CloudStack database  while registering VMware template
Added unit tests to String Utils methods and updated the code
Updated os description logic to keep equals ignore match with guest os display name
